author: Ana P Santos
title: Attacked & underpaid: Medics in Philippines battle stigma, virus
description: Philippine medical workers face derisory pay, outright hostility in a health system undermined by decades of neglect.
content:
Manila, Philippines - Joaquin Sapul, Jr started getting the frantic calls a few hours after the health department announced the first coronavirus case in Iloilo City in the central Philippines on March 21.
In response, The Medical City-Iloilo, the hospital w… [+8731 chars]
